pageContext.claim: “The last thing we need in Alabama and the U.S. Senate is a Schumer/Pelosi puppet who is WEAK on Crime, WEAK on the Border, Bad for our Military and our great Vets, Bad for our 2nd Amendment, AND WANTS TO RAISES TAXES TO THE SKY. Jones would be a disaster!”
pageContext.analysis: Doug Jones, the Democratic senate candidate, is a former federal prosecutor. He did not advocate for any tax increase and in fact supported a corporate tax cut.
